localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to search for a remote job without getting tracked, being forced to sign in, having your resume crawled, or experiencing "location bias"? Ever felt like your job search has been at the expense of your privacy? We have. And we're fixing it.
nodes.title: Remote Hill - Privacy-centric, international, remote-only job board
nodes.author: Nathan Clark

nodes.excerpt: Candid helps companies resume screen applicants to find the best and filter out the rest. Is your resume good enough to pass a resume screening? See if you pass the test by trying our demo on our website by uploading your resume to get automated insights.
nodes.title: Candid Resumes - Unbiased resume screening on autopilot
nodes.author: Ted Chiang

nodes.excerpt: Replace a ton of contact finding tools and spreadsheets with one simple free tool: - Source (X-Ray search) - Contact Enrichment (enrich profiles with free+premium contact details using the Chrome extension) - Nurture (bulk emailing, notes, call logs, etc.)
nodes.title: Webbtree - Get contact details and perform CRM for recruitment
nodes.author: Ajinkya Soman

nodes.excerpt: For the best tech & startup jobs and talent around the world, try techpool.io or the techpool apps on the Google and Apple app stores!
nodes.title: techpool - Tech, startup jobs and talent around the world
nodes.author: Thomas L.

nodes.excerpt: FaceCode is the most intelligent coding interview tool ever built. It's helps interviewers make objective hiring decisions with ease, speed and accuracy.
nodes.title: FaceCode 2.0 - The best coding interview tool ever built
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Meetcode tech interview helps companies to accelerate & scale hiring by integrating the need of face-to-face communication and key competencies evaluation, including library of 250+ questions, 20+programming languages and developersâ€™ preferred built-in IDE.
nodes.title: Meetcode - Find top developers effortlessly by online code interview
nodes.author: Meetcode

nodes.excerpt: How do you craft an interview process that accurately assesses a candidate's skill level while ensuring you're not eliminating qualified candidates? Take this 5 minute quiz and get actionable recommendations to improve your technical interview.
nodes.title: NOT THE PIPELINE - Take a 5 minute quiz and fix your tech interview
nodes.author: Jess Solka

nodes.excerpt: Panther helps startups employ people in 160+ countries without having to set up foreign subsidiaries. We automate global compliance, payroll, taxes, and benefits, so you can build a world-class remote team without losing focus of your company's growth ğŸš€
nodes.title: Panther - Global employment for remote teams
nodes.author: DeWayne Johnson

nodes.excerpt: Remote empowers companies of all sizes to employ global teams. We take care of international payroll, benefits, taxes, and compliance, so you can focus on growing your business.
nodes.title: Remote - Remote empowers companies to employ global teams compliantly
nodes.author: Hallie Exall

nodes.excerpt: Relocate.me is a 75,000-user strong niche job board for tech roles with relocation. It comes with a wealth of information on all things job relocation to help you decide where to move for work.
nodes.title: Relocate 3.0 - Get your next tech job abroad
nodes.author: Denis Dinkevich

nodes.excerpt: Anonymously vouch for the best engineers among your LinkedIn connections and get $1500 for everyone who gets hired. You get assured $20 for just syncing your LinkedIn. Help your friends get connected to top Y-Combinator founders directly. No recruiters.
nodes.title: Hiring Club - Recommend engineers to top startups and earn $1500 per hire
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Storetasker matches you to a trusted Shopify Expert within a few hours for projects big and small. We've interviewed over 5,000 developers, hand selected the top 5%, and streamlined the experience from end to end.
nodes.title: Storetasker 2.0 - Where Shopify brands meet their developer
nodes.author: Charlie Fogarty

nodes.excerpt: Resume Work helps thousands of job seeking people create a job-worthy resume. With Impact, you'll get a fast, and well designed resume for your job application.
nodes.title: Resume Work - Create a job-worthy resume for free
nodes.author: Saijo George

nodes.excerpt: Career Emails is a collection of great email templates that cover a number of networking situations, including how to ask an industry leader for advice, cold email alumni, follow up with someone, write effective LinkedIn connection request notes, and more!
nodes.title: Networking Emails - 100+ proven email templates to help your career in 2021
nodes.author: Rohan Mahtani

nodes.excerpt: Job Description is an AI-based service utilising GPT-3 to generate high-quality professional job descriptions for businesses attracting the best talent. Generate professional job descriptions in seconds. No previous writing experience required.
nodes.title: Job Description AI - Create professional job descriptions in seconds using AI
nodes.author: Oras Al-Kubaisi

nodes.excerpt: This is a twitter bot that helps you find your next internship. Mention the bot in any intern hiring tweet to amplify it. Follow the bot to get internship opportunities.
nodes.title: InternFinder - Bot that helps you amplify as well as find new internships.
nodes.author: Manan Agarwal

nodes.excerpt: https://cv.me is simple.. For Job Applicants. - Create your online CV and share a link with anyone. - Apply to jobs with a 'single click'. For HR / Recruiters. - Post Jobs. - Applicant Tracking System to track candidates. - Invite colleagues to track jobs.
nodes.title: CV.ME - Create a CV, apply to jobs, post jobs, track applicants.
nodes.author: Nathan C

nodes.excerpt: Integrate Willo async video interviews with your workflow and unlock productivity super powers. Connect over 2,000 applications with the help of Zapier and interview people without the hassle.
nodes.title: Zapier for Willo - Automate your hiring process with Zapier
nodes.author: Euan Cameron

nodes.excerpt: For too long, early stage startups have been a walled garden, so we decided to build a door. ğŸšª (1) Over text message, tell us what you're looking for (2) We'll monitor for matching jobs (3) We'll connect you with the founding team when there's a match
nodes.title: Pearl - An SMS hiring network for the startup world
nodes.author: Tim Connors

nodes.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter
nodes.title: Remotelane 3.0 - Remote jobs for everyone with the most simple ux and search
nodes.author: ronatory

nodes.excerpt: Niceboard is the easiest way to start your own niche job board business, without writing a single line of code. Set up your board in minutes, connect your own domain, view real-time application stats, backfill jobs, translate it, use the private API and more!
nodes.title: Niceboard 2.0 - Start a job board. No code required.
nodes.author: Olivier

nodes.excerpt: Placement is Everyone's Talent Agent. We help people get jobs through modern technology plus human support. Fly through your job search at Placement.com.
nodes.title: Placement - Fly through your job search with magic tools & expert advice
nodes.author: Sean Linehan
